## Origin
C1 (lateral mass) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
Occipital bone (basilar part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
C1 Ant ramus @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral**: flex AO Joint
- **Unilateral**: Lateral Flexion of AO joint

# Muscle groups
Rectus capitis anterior is part of the [prevertebral muscle group]({{< var ref-oians.path >}})
